description:
In the beginning, it was great. She was everything I wanted. Hot, sexy, lot's of sex, took care of herself and our place. But, as time went by, things changed. The place got more and more messy. The dinners on the table went away. The after work blowjobs dried up. She became - LAZY.
I felt trapped and deceived. I did not know what to do. Then I met the Trainer. I invited him in, and he fixed everything. He turned things around for my lazy girlfriend, and now she is taking care of everything and fucking me like a porn star!
title: Training My Lazy Girlfriend
